Our Work

  • An idea was born

    March 2020

    We decided to create an Ontology that connects Metaphors and Storytelling.

  • The selection of Shakespearian candidates and the extraction of the Mataphors

    As You Like It - Macbeth

    We decided to focus our efforts in one author, Shakespeare. As the amount of works of Shakespeare is impressive, we still needed to circoscript more our studying material, so we decided to work only on two plays: a Comedy, As You Like It, and a Tragedy, Macbeth.

    At this point we were able to manually locate and extract all the metphors in the two plays.

  • The Storytelling theories

    We followed a course of Storytellying and one of Semiotic, and we decided to identify the most interesting and approppriate theories using our knowledge.

  • The anlysis of the texts and the Metaphors

    At this point we had the metaphors and the storytelling theories, and we started to create connections and ipothesis between them in order to analize them, following a coerent scheme.

  • The Ontology started to become real
